Package tokentrading

Class Summary
GlobalTokenTrader This version of TokenTrader implements a global token trader strategy The global policy that we chose to implement is to ensure that gates always have least 3 tokens.
NoTokenTrader A version of TokenTrader which doesn't trade with any other gates.
ProfitTokenTrader Trades tokens with the goal of gaining as much profit as possible for a gate In order to maximize the profit of a gate it ensures that a gate always has one token
TokenTrader The TokenTrader class is used to specify particular policies that individual gates will use to trade tokens Instances contain information such as which gate they are trading tokens for, what to do when a token request is received, and what to do when tokens are low
